tool_description: Loads and validates images for annotation, extracting metadata and ensuring format compatibility for bounding box annotation workflows.

image_path.description: Full file path to the image file

max_size_mb.description: Maximum allowed image size in megabytes

error_messages: File not found: The specified image_path does not exist. Verify the path is correct and accessible.
Unsupported format: Image format not in supported_formats list. Convert to a supported format or update the supported_formats parameter.
File too large: Image exceeds max_size_mb limit. Reduce image size or increase the limit.
Corrupted file: Image file appears corrupted and cannot be read. Try with a different image file.
usage: Provide the image_path parameter pointing to your target image. Optionally specify supported_formats and max_size_mb to customize validation. Returns image metadata and validation status.

image_id.description: Unique identifier for the loaded image
